resources.string:
A a simple demo app for Reddit

Built with Kotlin and the following:
 • Navigation Framework
 • ViewModels and Live Data
 • Paging Library
 • Koin Dependency Injection
 • Glide for image loading
 • Retrofit for network requests
 • Gson for deserialization
 • Android Material components
 • .... and more
Built by Fabio Gottlicher\nTo see the source code, visit github.com/FabioCZ/SnooLite
